name: G4S plc
legal: Public limited company, registered in UK
goal: We seek to understand future EU initiatives and policies and to represent G4S' views to policymakers and legislators in the Commission, Council and Parliament if required on a wide range of issues affecting the company and our employees.
interests: Banking and financial services, Borders and Security, Business and Industry, Competition, Employment and Social Affairs, Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Trade
euInitiatives: Home affairs, the EU's Internal and External Security
